summary.description: An Open Source Unsupervised Algorithm for Discovery of Spontaneous Behaviors | Behavioral segmentation of open field in DeepLabCut, or B-SOID ("B-side"), is an unsupervised learning algorithm written in MATLAB that serves to discover behaviors that are not pre-defined by users | B-SOID: Behavioral segmentation of open field in DeepLabCut
summary.name: B-SOiD
